# lavinmq_federation_upstream_sets (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `vhost` (String) The vhost to list federation upstream sets from. If not specified, lists all federation upstream sets.

### Read-Only

- `federation_upstream_sets` (Attributes List) List of federation upstream sets. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--federation_upstream_sets))

<a id="nestedatt--federation_upstream_sets"></a>
### Nested Schema for `federation_upstream_sets`

Read-Only:

- `name` (String) Name of the federation upstream set.
- `upstreams` (List of String) List of upstream names in this set.
- `vhost` (String) Virtual host where the federation upstream set is defined.
